title: EU Regions Login & Chat  Issues - May 11
body:
Hey guys,


> **Update - 4:08pm Pacific **
>  Status page is in the clear, and players are now logging in.  Play some League fam, and thanks again!

---- 

> **Update - 3:00pm Pacific **
>  No longer needing logs!  We got a damn good amount and are making progress.  You guys rock!

----
> **Update - 2:36pm Pacific **
> Our network operations team has updated the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page, and working on a fix.

----
We're seeing reports from players on EU regions who are unable to reach the authentication servers and fail to login.  Another handful appear to lose connection to pvp.net (chat services), but are logging in without issue.  

We're investigating this now, and could use your help to pinpoint the problem. ~~If you are impacted by this, download our hextech repair tool to gather logs and attach them to a support ticket).~~  This will help our tech team review network and authentication logs to get this resolved.  Some of you have already done this, thank you!  {{summoner:31}} 

I'll post any info and updates here as they come.  Thanks for the assist!

replies.body: I just got in!{{summoner:31}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Yes!!!  Can I get some more confirmations?  :D
Just managed to login now too!   Awesome job guys! <3
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder468/500x/68487468.jpg
Hahaha, yeah awesome job!! :D
Can confirm - just logged in after 4 hours of no luck. Cheers!
You go Porocles{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Submitting a ticket wont help, guys. Dont even bother with it. I've been having this issue for 5 hours, still no response. they probably just chill on forum and fap fap fap while drinking coffee and laughing at us cuz we are mad and cant play.
i posted the request number and got my ticket opend under 30 min after i posted it

and i guess u still have the same problem? because riot. Im not saying porocles isnt working but pls, RIOT, how can they be so goooooooooooood damn bad at solving shit? First of all, back in the days, it took 2 whole years for them to fix the "non-playable sundays". Then there were a lot of more bugs, and now this shit. My friend wasted money to gift me RP for a name change, which means, HE PAYED RIOT and then i had this authenticating shit because u have to relog when changing name. So we basically paid riot to not be able to play anymore for tonight. That would be like donating money to makeup-artists. The money just blows away and are wasted on pure shit.

well, we are talking about a newly (6 hours) occuring unidentified problem, got a lot of steps to go throug to get a fix, would feel safe to assume i can play when i get on tomorrow. never had a big problem like this last long in my time with the game, also i feel like complaining wount really help at all, it is like flaming your teammates, it wount really help anything but maybe making you happy, maybe thats just me tho... imma hit the bed now tho see you on the rift i guess
Well, wasted evening staring at logging screen. Ticket #30241583
This is happening again! :'(
Hey, having the same problem here. Norway, ISP: Altibox. I've sent a ticket with the logs attached: #30241979
Ty for a pinned topic
i have that problem for 45 min know so have tride evriting exept for hextech repair tool
I have the same problem today. Trying all the things explained on the help and support session from the cleaning cookies,  hextech repair to reinstall the client. Can i get some help
EUW having this same issue cropping up again :-( Can't log-in with my EUW account since around an hour ago.

The problem with getting stuck in the authentication phase is still persisting. Thought about playing after a 5 month break but can't log in. Tried searching through all the forums for solutions and tried everything mentioned under "connection issues", nothing, no results. When will this problem be fixed?
Server: EUW. Playing from Denmark. ISP: Hiper.

Thanks dude!  I was about to reply to your other post!  You should be able to just toss the zip file into your ticket but if it's too large, what we're really looking for are the **LeagueClient Logs** for this specific case.  You can zip up that folder by itself and attach it.  Thanks!

No problem mate! Things like this can always happen, and i´m glad to help :) 
Im currently on a Mac, but i went in all the folders from the "LoL Logs" And added the latest logs from the following folders -> Launcher, Maestro, Network, Patcher and R3D. Hope that´s the correct logs!

update ?
:D
Do yall refund my xp boost when this is done?;D

It would suck to lose out on a boost that you couldn't use, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make guarantees on a refund or renewal, but generally we prefer to look at each case individually.  See you there!
porocles do u have an idea about how much time its gonna take just like avergae time for problems like this ?
They are still trying to figure out the problem / working on it. It will take less time if you use the Hextech Repair tool and add the Logs in a ticket for them!
Just wanted to say that I submitted the ticket with the information you asked for, I am from EUNE. Thanks for looking into it, but is there any ETA?
Thanks!  I don't have any updates to offer right now, but I'm keeping an eye out.
well when did u find out not to be mean but i waited in 6 hours now :/ and tried reinstall league to :D hope u wil say when its up
i can log in in euw but in eune is still  Authenticating
Same for me lmao, I guess its time to up my western account
Hope you can fix it :d
me to

Hey, Porocles. I hope this helps, maybe it´s a bug or something. -->
So im having the exact same problems as the others, but one thing that is strange is that my friends see me as online. But on my screen it just keeps trying to log in with the text "Authenticating".

Doing a Tracert to EUW server (both to 162.249.72.1 and 185.40.65.1), I get to riot-ic-310570-s-b6.c.telia.net [62.115.54.138] and after that it times out.
Tracert to NA servers works fine.{{champion:32}}

Tracert to EUNE it halts after internap-ic-305857-ffm-b11.c.telia.net [62.115.41.206]
So by the looks of things, the problem might be with Telia servers?
